House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07967
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE GOVERNMENT INTERNSHIP PROGRAM, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to equip new graduates with the skills needed for their first jobs and to shape their behavior towards work by educating them in a Government Internship Program.
ALIAS NAME : “Government Internship Program of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CUA, DAKILA CARLO E.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
